item.title: 'Gladiator II' director Ridley Scott backtracks on AI after calling it a 'technical hydrogen bomb' - Fox News
item.description:
1. 'Gladiator II' director Ridley Scott backtracks on AI after calling it a 'technical hydrogen bomb'  Fox News
  2. Ridley Scott Says ​​'Gladiator II' Is Just ‘as Good’ as Oscar-Winning Original (Exclusive)  PEOPLE
